Service Details: - Provides family counselling and therapy for parents, children and youth experiencing challenges- Works collaboratively and respectfully to help families seek the changes they are looking for using a Family Systems Perspective- Believes that individuals cannot be understood in isolation from one another, but rather as part of their family, as the family is an emotional unit- Committed to building a stronger community by working systemically and collaboratively with families in all forms
